member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptions
member.summary: Represents configuration options for the Devexp API client.
member.remarks:
This record encapsulates all runtime configuration parameters used by the and its sub-clients. Options include base URL, authentication, HTTP behavior, retry policies, logging, and metrics collection.
Instances of this class are created via the to ensure correct initialization.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptions.BaseUrl
member.summary: Gets the base URL of the Devexp API.
member.remarks: Defaults to http://localhost:3000. In production scenarios, this should point to the official API endpoint.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptions.ApiKey
member.summary: Gets the API key used for authenticating requests.
member.remarks: If not set, the method will throw .

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptions.Timeout
member.summary: Gets the maximum duration to wait for an HTTP response before timing out.
member.remarks: Defaults to 30 seconds.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptions.EnableAutoRetries
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether automatic retries should be enabled for transient failures.
member.remarks: Defaults to true.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptions.MaxRetryAttempts
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of retry attempts when is enabled.
member.remarks: Defaults to 3.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptions.RetryDelayInMilliseconds
member.summary: Gets the delay interval between retry attempts.
member.remarks: Defaults to 2000 milliseconds.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptions.EnableLogging
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether request and response logging is enabled.
member.remarks: Logging is performed through the instance if provided. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptions.Logger
member.summary: Gets the logger instance used for diagnostic logging.
member.remarks: Must implement from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptions.EnableMetrics
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether performance metrics collection is enabled.
member.remarks: When enabled, the callback will be invoked after each API operation with performance data.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptions.OnOperationCompleted
member.summary: Gets the callback invoked when an API operation completes, providing performance metrics data.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptions.DefaultPageSize
member.summary: Gets the default page size used in paginated API requests.
member.remarks: Defaults to 20.

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptionsBuilder
member.summary: Provides a fluent builder for creating instances.
member.remarks:
This builder follows a fluent interface pattern, allowing chaining of configuration methods before calling to produce an immutable instance.
The property must be set using before invoking , otherwise an will be thrown.

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptionsBuilder.CreateDefault
member.summary: Creates a new instance with default values.

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptionsBuilder.WithApiKey(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the API key to be used for authenticating requests.
member.param: The API key string.

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptionsBuilder.WithBaseUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the base URL for the API.
member.param: The base URL string.

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptionsBuilder.WithTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the maximum HTTP timeout for requests.
member.param: The maximum time to wait before a request times out.

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptionsBuilder.EnableRetries(System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Enables automatic retries for transient failures.
member.param: The maximum number of retry attempts. Defaults to 3.
The delay interval between retries. Defaults to 2000 milliseconds if not provided.

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptionsBuilder.DisableRetries
member.summary: Disables automatic retries for transient failures.

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptionsBuilder.EnableLogging(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Enables logging and assigns the specified instance.
member.param: The logger instance used for diagnostic logging.

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptionsBuilder.WithOperationProfiler(System.Action{DevexpApiSdk.Common.Metrics.OperationPerformanceMetric})
member.summary: Enables operation profiling and sets a hook callback for performance metrics collection.
member.param: The callback invoked after each operation with performance data.

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptionsBuilder.WithPageSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the default page size for paginated API requests.
member.param: The default number of items per page.

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptionsBuilder.Build
member.summary: Builds and returns a new instance with the configured values.
member.remarks: This method validates that an API key has been provided using . If the API key is not set, an will be thrown.
member.exception: Thrown if no API key was provided.

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Exceptions.ApiAuthException
member.summary: Exception thrown when an API authentication error occurs (HTTP 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden).

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Exceptions.ApiException
member.summary: General exception for API errors.

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Exceptions.ApiKeyMissingException
member.summary: Exception thrown when no API key is provided.

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Exceptions.ApiNotFoundException
member.summary: Exception thrown when a requested resource is not found (HTTP 404 Not Found).

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Exceptions.ApiServerException
member.summary: Exception thrown when a server error occurs (HTTP 5xx).

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Exceptions.ApiValidationException
member.summary: Exception thrown when a validation error occurs (HTTP 400 Bad Request).

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Exceptions.InvalidPhoneNumberException
member.summary: Exception thrown when a phone number is not in valid E.164 format.

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Metrics.OperationPerformanceMetric
member.summary: Represents performance metrics collected during the execution of an API operation.
member.remarks: This model is typically passed to the callback when metrics are enabled.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Metrics.OperationPerformanceMetric.OperationName
member.summary: Gets the logical name of the operation being executed.
member.remarks: For example, "Contacts.AddContact" or "Messages.SendMessage".

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Metrics.OperationPerformanceMetric.Duration
member.summary: Gets the total execution duration of the operation.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Metrics.OperationPerformanceMetric.ItemCount
member.summary: Gets the number of items processed or returned by the operation, if applicable.
member.remarks: For non-collection operations, this property may be null.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Metrics.OperationPerformanceMetric.Success
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the operation completed successfully.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Metrics.OperationPerformanceMetric.Exception
member.summary: Gets the exception thrown during the operation, if any.
member.remarks: If is true, this property will be null.

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.Common.Security.WebhookVerifier.VerifySignature(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies the HMAC-SHA256 signature of a webhook request.
member.param: The raw body of the request as a string.
The value of the Authorization header (format: "Signature {hex}").
The shared webhook secret used to sign the request.
member.returns: true if the signature is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Contacts.IContactsClient
member.summary: Provides a strongly-typed client for interacting with the Contacts resource domain of the Devexp API.
member.remarks: This client encapsulates HTTP operations for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting contact records. It performs input validation (e.g., E.164 phone numbers) and wraps execution with optional metrics .

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.Contacts.IContactsClient.GetContactsAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves a paged list of contacts.
member.param: The index of the page to retrieve (1-based).
The maximum number of contacts per page.
An optional cancellation token.
member.returns: A paged result containing the requested contacts.
member.exception: Thrown if authentication fails.
Thrown if the server encounters an error (5XX error).
Thrown if the API returns an unexpected error.

member.summary: Retrieves a paged list of contacts using the default page size.

An optional cancellation token.
member.returns: A paged result containing the requested contacts.
member.exception: Thrown if authentication fails.

Thrown if the API returns an unexpected error.

members.member:

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.IMessagesClient
member.summary: Provides a strongly-typed client for interacting with the Messages resource domain of the Devexp API.
member.remarks: This client encapsulates HTTP operations for sending messages, retrieving messages by ID, and listing messages. It leverages for transport and DTO mappers for response transformation.

member.summary: Gets or sets the sender identifier.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.Models.CreateMessageRequest.To

member.remarks: The property must contain a valid referencing an existing contact.

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.Models.CreateMessageContactRequest
member.summary: Represents the recipient of a message by contact identifier.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.Models.CreateMessageContactRequest.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the recipient contact.

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.Models.Message
member.summary: Represents a message entity in the Devexp API.
member.remarks: A message contains content, sender and recipient information, delivery status, and timestamps for creation and delivery.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.Models.Message.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the message.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.Models.Message.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the body content of the message.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.Models.Message.From
member.summary: Gets or sets the sender identifier.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.Models.Message.To
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the recipient contact.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.Models.Message.ToContact
member.summary: Gets or sets the recipient contact entity, if available.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.Models.Message.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets the current delivery status of the message.
member.remarks: Values include Queued, Delivered, or Failed.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.Models.Message.CreatedAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp when the message was created.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.Models.Message.DeliveredAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp when the message was successfully delivered, if applicable.
member.remarks: This property is null if the message has not yet been delivered.

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.Messages.Models.MessageStatus
member.summary: Represents the delivery status of a message.

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.DevexpApiClient
member.summary: Provides a strongly-typed client wrapper for interacting with the Devexp API.
member.remarks: This client encapsulates HTTP communication with the Devexp API and exposes typed sub-clients for managing specific resource domains such as and .

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.DevexpApiClient.Contacts
member.summary: Provides access to all Contacts API operations, such as creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting contacts.
member.remarks: This property returns an instance of that wraps the underlying HTTP communication with the Contacts resource domain.

member.name: P:DevexpApiSdk.DevexpApiClient.Messages
member.summary: Provides access to all Messages API operations, including sending messages and retrieving delivery status.
member.remarks: This property returns an instance of that encapsulates all messaging-related endpoints.

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.DevexpApiClient.#ctor(DevexpApiSdk.Common.DevexpApiOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified options.
member.param: Optional configuration options for the API client. If null, a default configuration will be created using .

member.name: M:DevexpApiSdk.DevexpApiClient.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified API key.
member.param: The API key used for authenticating requests against the Devexp API.
member.exception: Thrown when is null, empty, or invalid.

member.name: T:DevexpApiSdk.IDevexpApiClient
member.summary: Defines the contract for the Devexp API client, providing access to all resource domain sub-clients.
